t: Aleksandar Hemon - Alchetron, The Free Social Encyclopedia
s: January 13, 2024 - Aleksandar Hemon (born September 9, 1964) is a Bosnianborn American fiction writer, essayist, and critic. His best known novels are Nowhere Man (2002) and The Lazarus Project (2008). He frequently publishes in The New Yorker, and has also written for Esquire, The Paris Review, the OpEd page of the
